item.title: By: chris

item.description: <p>Another version, this time in french, called Bloc de pub (you can find it here : <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.blocdepub.com),""/ rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.blocdepub.com),"</a> rel="nofollow"><a href="http://www.blocdepub.com),"/ rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.blocdepub.com),</a></a> and selling each bloc of 10x10 pixels only 10 euros instead of 100$ ... starts to be really interesting now!</p>
item.content:encoded: Another version, this time in french, called Bloc de pub (you can find it here : http://www.blocdepub.com/),” rel=”nofollow”>http://www.blocdepub.com/), and selling each bloc of 10×10 pixels only 10 euros instead of 100$ … starts to be really interesting now!

item.title: By: FIona

item.description: <p>Matthew, <br/><br/><br/><br/>just had a look at this. May be difficult to spot which one is yours! Is it the one with 50 on?</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matthew,

just had a look at this. May be difficult to spot which one is yours! Is it the one with 50 on?
